ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
8 Cameras:1/3" SONY CCD, 700 TV lines, Vari-Focal 4~9mm manual lens 30 IR LEDs. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on). Water proof
8 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time Recording+Playback, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs. 2 USB port for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprise CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & D1 30FPS Real-Time Recording+Playback, 8 Cameras 1/3" SONY CCD 700 TVL Vari-Focal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
